sentence.Network_en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentence.Network_cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

sentence.Network_en: She must have some ulterior motive for being nice to me—what does she really want?
sentence.Network_cn: 她对我这么好，一定别有用心—她到底想干什么呢？

sentence.Network_en: She definitely had an ulterior motive in offering to help.
sentence.Network_cn: 她主动提出帮忙,肯定有不可告人的动机.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, literally further, more distant'

entry.tran: （动机等）隐蔽的，隐秘的，隐藏的
entry.def: If you say that someone has an ulterior motive for doing something, you believe that they have a hidden reason for doing it.

example.ex: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan...
example.tran: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

example.ex: Posing for the camera pleased him more than anything else. No doubt with the ulterior object of catching votes.
example.tran: 在照相机前摆姿势是最令他高兴的事了，背后的动机无疑是为了拉选票。

means.word_mean: 1. lying beyond what is openly revealed or avowed (especially being kept in the background or deliberately concealed);

sentences.sentence: "looked too closely for an ulterior purpose in all knowledge"- Bertrand Russell

means.word_mean: 2. beyond or outside an area of immediate interest; remote;

sentences.sentence: "a suggestion ulterior to the present discussion"

means.word_mean: 3. coming at a subsequent time or stage;

sentences.sentence: "the future president entered college at the age of 16"

auth_sentence.content: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.

auth_sentence.content: The request was only preparatory to ulterior measures.
auth_sentence.res_content: The request was only preparatory to ulterior measures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The request was only preparatory to ulterior measures.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Qin said the allegations are being made for ulterior motives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Qin said the allegations are being made for ulterior motives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Qin said the allegations are being made for ulterior motives.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词或表名词,"较……的;较……"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infer下面+ior较……的;较……→adj.下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的 n.下级,晚辈
inter在……内+ior较……的;较……→adj.内部的,里面的 n.内部,内地
sen老+ior较……的;较……→adj.年长的;地位较高的 n.[大学]四年级学生
super在……上面+ior较……的;较……→adj.优良的,卓越的;上级的 n.上级;长者;高手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 较晚的,较远的,不可告人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ulter远+ior较……的;较……→adj.较晚的,较远的,不可告人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 年少的/者,三年级的/学生,下级[的]
stems_affixes.word_buile: jun年轻+ior较……的;较……→adj.&n.年少的/者,三年级的/学生,下级[的]
infer下面+ior较……的;较……→adj.下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的 n.下级,晚辈
inter在……内+ior较……的;较……→adj.内部的,里面的 n.内部,内地
sen老+ior较……的;较……→adj.年长的;地位较高的 n.[大学]四年级学生
super在……上面+ior较……的;较……→adj.优良的,卓越的;上级的 n.上级;长者;高手

means.word_mean: 日后的,将来的;进一步的

sentences.en: I want to know what is our ulterior action.
sentences.cn: 我想要知道下一步的行动是什么。

means.word_mean: 秘而不宣的;有意隐瞒的；别有用心的

sentences.en: She definitely had an ulterior motive in offering to help.
sentences.cn: 她主动提出帮忙, 肯定有不可告人的动机。

sentences.en: I suspect he may have had ulterior motives for being so generous.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他如此慷慨大方也许是别有用心。
